Notes.Text:
This update for MozillaFirefox fixes the following issues:

Update to Firefox Extended Support Release 128.10.1 ESR.
    
- MFSA 2025-37 (bsc#1243303)
  * CVE-2025-4918: Out-of-bounds access when resolving Promise objects
  * CVE-2025-4919: Out-of-bounds access when optimizing linear sums
Notes.Title: Details

Notes.Text: The CVRF data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).

Vulnerabilities.Description: An attacker was able to perform an out-of-bounds read or write on a JavaScript `Promise` object. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 138.0.4, Firefox ESR < 128.10.1, Firefox ESR < 115.23.1, Thunderbird < 128.10.2, and Thunderbird < 138.0.2.

Vulnerabilities.Description: An attacker was able to perform an out-of-bounds read or write on a JavaScript object by confusing array index sizes. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 138.0.4, Firefox ESR < 128.10.1, Firefox ESR < 115.23.1, Thunderbird < 128.10.2, and Thunderbird < 138.0.2.
